players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I investigated Alice last night and discovered she is the mafioso. We must vote her out to protect the town."
Charlie: "I trust Diana's investigation result. Alice being the mafioso makes sense given her silence so far. We should vote to arrest Alice to protect the town."
You: "Diana is lying to frame me as the mafioso. We should vote for her instead!"
Diana: "Alice is lying to save herself. I stand by my investigation—she's the mafioso. Vote her out now to protect us all."
Charlie: "I believe Diana is telling the truth since Bob was killed last night and she’s the only one with investigative info. We should vote to arrest Alice to keep the town safe."
You: "Diana's just trying to mislead us all. If she's the detective, prove it—vote her out instead!"
